534.question: What different correlations result when using different variants of ROUGE scores?
534.response: {'Answer': 'The correlation between SERA and pyramid scores is the highest when using the discounted variant of SERA (SERA-DIS), followed by SERA with noun phrase query reformulation (SERA-NP), and then SERA with keyword query reformulation (SERA-KW). This is because SERA-DIS is more tolerant of errors in the generated summaries, and SERA-NP and SERA-KW are able to better capture the content of the gold summaries.'}
534.answer: Using Pearson corelation measure,  for example, ROUGE-1-P is 0.257 and ROUGE-3-F 0.878.
